question: [Challenge] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.

qas.question: [Challenge] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.
[Detailed] Turkce: Histograma gore how many samples were used in total belirt.
[Note] Portugues: Informe how many entries fall inside the modal bin com base no histograma.
